---
title: "Contact"
---

Feel free to send a note. (No email address posted to avoid scraping.)

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/abcdwxyz" method="POST">
  <div>
    <label>Name</label><br>
    <input type="text" name="name" required>
  </div>
  <br>
  <div>
    <label>Email (so I can reply)</label><br>
    <input type="email" name="email" required>
  </div>
  <br>
  <div>
    <label>Message</label><br>
    <textarea name="message" rows="7" required></textarea>
  </div>

  <!-- Honeypot anti-spam field (should stay empty) -->
  <input type="text" name="_gotcha" style="display:none">

  <!-- Optional: customize subject -->
  <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="New message from your site">

  <br>
  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>
